mapper.select: select id, church_id, gyogu_id, zo_id, mokjang_id from oe_group where id = #{mokjangId}
select id, church_id, gyogu_id, zo_id, mokjang_id from oe_group
mapper.insert: insert into oe_group(id, church_id, gyogu_id, zo_id, mokjang_id) values(#{groupId}, #{churchId}, #{gyoguId}, #{zoId}, #{mokjangId})
